contentList.content: Your strikes are enhanced by concentrated bursts of air. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].

Can't be used at the same time as <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="pie_Manifestation_of_Earth">Manifestation of Earth</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="pie_Manifestation_of_Fire">Manifestation of Fire</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="pie_Manifestation_of_Water">Manifestation of Water</LSTag>.
Use your ki to corrode your enemies' armor. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].

Can't be used at the same time as <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="pie_Manifestation_of_Air">Manifestation of Air</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="pie_Manifestation_of_Fire">Manifestation of Fire</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="pie_Manifestation_of_Water">Manifestation of Water</LSTag>.
Infuse your strikes with fiery essence. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].

Can't be used at the same time as <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="pie_Manifestation_of_Air">Manifestation of Air</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="pie_Manifestation_of_Earth">Manifestation of Earth</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="pie_Manifestation_of_Water">Manifestation of Water</LSTag>.
Your strikes slow the ki flow in your enemies' bodies. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].

Can't be used at the same time as <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="pie_Manifestation_of_Air">Manifestation of Air</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="pie_Manifestation_of_Earth">Manifestation of Earth</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="pie_Manifestation_of_Fire">Manifestation of Fire</LSTag>.
